name: the PEOPLES' snare drum
description:
-14"X6"
-100% 10 ply Maple
- Satin Stained finishes
-Chrome Bridge lugs
-Chrome 2.3mm Triple Flanged Hoops
-Standard Throwoff
-EVANS drumheads

We wanted to create a snare drum that everyone could afford, including us.  So, the PEOPLES' snare drum was born.  This is a very versatile snare drum, giving you the option of a fatter tone by down tuning and a powerful crack by tuning up.  The PEOPLES' snare drum is currently used by Richard Shell of Triumph and Parade and is featured on their latest album.  It comes in a variety of satin stained finishes and is drowned in chrome hardware.  BRAVURA's contribution to those who drum on a tight budget.  A snare drum for the masses.


                       the PEOPLES' snare drum




www.myspace.com/triumphandparade

name: Hybrid Snare Upgrade Kit
description:
-14" 15ply Maple, 2.5" shell top
-Satin Stained Finish
-Tension rods
-Evans HD Dry Snare batter head

Do you desperately want a hybrid snare drum but don't have the money for it?  BRAVURA has come up with the solution to what many drummers are searching for and all you need is a metal snare drum...

The Hybrid Snare Upgrade Kit is the solution to that metal snare drum that you have laying around.  This upgrade kit ONLY fits 14", metal, rolled edge snare drums.  The kit is good for making your metal snare sound better by adding depth and wood to the drum, this gives your drum that thicker, deeper tone that many drummers crave.  The kit comes in a variety of satin stained finish colors and different size tension rods specific to your drum.

Colors Available: Yellow, Golden Amber, Bright Orange, Bright Red, Dark Red, Pink, Purple, Navy Blue, Indigo Blue, Turquoise, Bright Green, Dark Green, Rosewood Brown, Walnut Brown, Black, Silver, and Natural.

For correct tension rod length, measure the depth of your snare drum and the length of one lug from end to end.  Include these 2 measurements in the comments section when you checkout.

If you are dealing with a sales rep, please put their name in the comment section as well.
